text: When Lovers Part is an American silent film produced by Kalem Company and directed by Sidney Olcott with Gene Gauntier, Jack J. Clark, Robert Vignola and JP McGowan in the leading roles. A copy is kept in the Desmet collection at Eye Film Institute (Amsterdam). ==Cast== * Gene Gauntier - Nell * Jack J. Clark - * Robert Vignola - Back servant * JP McGowan - Nell's father ==Production notes== The film was shot in Jacksonville, Florida. ==External links== * *American Film Institute Catalog * When Lovers Part website dedicated to Sidney Olcott *Film at YouTube Category:1910 films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American silent short films Category:Films set in Florida Category:Films shot in Jacksonville, Florida Category:Films directed by Sidney Olcott Category:1910 short films Category:1910 drama films Category:American black-and-white films
title: When Lovers Part
